Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Agendas & Minutes](https://www.arlingtonwa.gov/AgendaCenter)

   Access easily searchable meeting agendas and minutes for various boards, commissions, and committees.
2. #### [Arlington Municipal Code](https://library.municode.com/wa/arlington/codes/code_of_ordinances)

   View the Municipal Code for Arlington, WA.
3. #### [Boards & Commissions](https://www.arlingtonwa.gov/424/Boards-Commissions)

   Residents of the City volunteer to serve a designated term on a commission, board or committee and are instrumental in recommending policies and procedures to the Council.
4. #### [City Meeting Calendar](https://www.arlingtonwa.gov/calendar.aspx?CID=22&showPastEvents=false)

   Find out what meetings are being held.
5. #### [City Council](https://www.arlingtonwa.gov/396/City-Council)

   Find out when this council meets and where.
6. #### [Civil Rights and Accessibility](https://www.arlingtonwa.gov/749/Civil-Rights-and-Accessibility)

   Civil Rights and Accessibility
